data.description: Access to and modification of JPEG meta-data
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Image-MetaData-JPEG

    It concerns graphic files --> Image

    It concerns additional information in the file, like comments or
    notes --> MetaData

    It is written for JPEG files --> JPEG (TIFF files could follow in
    the future ...)
